title: Do the Zeit Thing 1/6: Meat Loaf v Greta Thunberg, Puerto Rico, George Lopez, Prodigy 7700, Jeffrey Epstein
itunes:title: Do the Zeit Thing 1/6: Meat Loaf v Greta Thunberg, Puerto Rico, George Lopez, Prodigy 7700, Jeffrey Epstein
description:
On this edition of Do the Zeit Thing Jack and Miles discuss Meat Loaf going off on Greta Thunberg, the earthquake in Puerto Rico, George Lopez' comments 'threatening' Trump, the Prodigy 7700 toilet, and new autopsy pictures of Jeffrey Epstein.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
